name: Awesome Widgets for SiteOrigin Page Builder
author: phoeniixx

sections.description:
FREE VERSION DEMO LINK | FREE VERSION DOCUMENTATION LINK

Overview

Awesome Widgets for SiteOrigin Page Builder is a great plugin and it help you add Woocommerce Products Featured Collection, New Arrival, Sale Off, Best Seller and Category on any page of your site.

Free Features:

Featured Collection Widget
Any product that has been set as ‘Featured’ would appear under this widget.
You could set the widget on any page of your website.

New Arrival Widget
The recently added products would be displayed under this widget.
You could set the widget on any page of your website.

Sale OFF Widget
All the On-Sale products would be displayed under the Sale Off Widget.
The widget could be added on any page.

Best Seller Widget
Products that have been sold maximum number of times are automatically picked and displayed under this widget.
The widget could be added on any page.

Category Widget
Same Category Products are displayed under Category Widget.
The widget could be added on any page.

Common Features of Above Widgets
a. You could edit the Title of the widget
b. You could set the number of products that you want to display at a time.
c. You could set the carousel as ‘on’ or ‘off’

FREE VERSION DEMO LINK | FREE VERSION DOCUMENTATION LINK

Take a look at how to set up Awesome Widget for SiteOrigin Page Builder for Woocommerce

Premium Features:

PREMIUM VERSION LIVE DEMO | PREMIUM VERSION LINK | DOCUMENTATION LINK

Premium All in one Widget

  • Show Bestseller, Featured, New Arrival, Sales off products in Single TAB
  • Advance Styling

All in one Widget View LIVE DEMO

Premium Best Seller Widget

  • Show Bestseller products of multiple categories using Tabs
  • Show View All Button
  • Link View All Button to Custom Url
  • Advance Styling
  • Option to Add Description below Title
  • Advance Styling of Title, Description, View All Button and TABS

Best Seller Widget View LIVE DEMO

Premium Featured Widget

  • Show Featured products of multiple categories using Tabs
  • Show View All Button
  • Link View All Button to Custom Url
  • Advance Styling
  • Option to Add Description below Title
  • Advance Styling of Title, Description, View All Button and TABS

Featured Widget View LIVE DEMO

Premium Sale Off Widget

  • Show Sale products of multiple categories using Tabs
  • Show View All Button
  • Link View All Button to Custom Url
  • Advance Styling
  • Option to Add Description below Title
  • Advance Styling of Title, Description, View All Button and TABS

Sale Off Widget View LIVE DEMO

Premium New Arrival Widget

  • Show New Arrival products of multiple categories using Tabs
  • Show View All Button
  • Link View All Button to Custom Url
  • Advance Styling
  • Option to Add Description below Title
  • Advance Styling of Title, Description, View All Button and TABS

New Arrival Widget View LIVE DEMO

Premium Category Widget

  • Show products of multiple categories using Tabs
  • Show View All Button
  • Link View All Button to Custom Url
  • Advance Styling
  • Option to Add Description below Title
  • Advance Styling of Title, Description, View All Button and TABS

Category Widget View LIVE DEMO

Premium Advanced Headlines Widget

  • Create Multicolor Headlines
  • Option to Add Divider
  • Option to Add Description
  • Advance Styling

Advanced Headlines Widget View LIVE DEMO

Premium Flip Box Widget

  • Four types of Flip Box, flip from Left, Right, Top and Bottom
  • Option to Add Fontawesome icon
  • Option to Add Title
  • Option to Add Description
  • Option to Add Custom Button
  • Advance Styling

Flip Box Widget View LIVE DEMO

Premium Info Box Widget

  • Option to Add Title
  • Option to Add Description
  • Option to Add Custom Button
  • Option to Add Images
  • Option to Align Images- Left and Right
  • Advance Styling of Title, Description, View All Button and TABS

Info Box Widget View LIVE DEMO

Premium Modal Widget

  • Popup with SlideRight
  • Popup with SlideUp
  • Popup with SlideDown
  • Popup with SlideLeft
  • Popup with FadeIn
  • Popup with Social Widget
  • Popup with Table
  • Popup with Contact Form
  • Tiny MCE editor to Add Content, Image, Shortcode, Contact Form7, Social Widgets, Table
  • Advance Styling

Modal Widget View LIVE DEMO

Premium Special Hover Effect Widget

  • 24 Hover Effects
  • Option to Add Title
  • Option to Add Description
  • Option to Add Background Images
  • Option to Add Custom Button
  • Advance Styling

Special Hover Effect Widget View LIVE DEMO

Premium Intractive Widget

  • 21 Animation Styles
  • Option to Add Title
  • Option to Add Description
  • Option to Add Custom Links
  • Option to Add Icons
  • Option to Add Background Images
  • Advance Styling

Intractive Widget View LIVE DEMO

PREMIUM VERSION LIVE DEMO | PREMIUM VERSION LINK | DOCUMENTATION LINK

sections.installation:
1. Install WordPress
  2. Go to your WordPress admin panel, and then to Plugins. Click on “Add New” and then upload the zip file of the plugin using the “Upload Plugin” button you can find on top of the screen.
  3. For the plugin to work as it should, WooCommerce plugin has to be installed and enabled.
